reviewText:
I will give this game a positive review... the game is not horrible, but it has all been done before, and better, by other developers.

Too much like Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved, but without all of the flashy graphics.

In fact, I'd say buy Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved first, and if you can't have enough twin-stick arena shooters, please, buy this one, too.
voteText: 6 of 8 people (75%) found this review helpful

reviewText: This game is a lazy and poorly implemented rip off Geometry Wars. The scrolling is rickety, the enemies boring and the design is completely unoriginal.\nIt features such wonderful bugs like Unable to shoot after pausing the game" and "clearing a stage doesn't unlock the next one" but to be fair: the developer does seem to care as there have been fixes to past problems. Hopefully the others will be fixed too."
voteText: 2 of 2 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Fun, but don't expect too much right now.  It's similar to Geometry Wars, but not nearly as deep at this point.  Also, it has some bugs.  It's currently worth a shot on discount or in a bundle.
